description: This file defines a Flutter provider using Riverpod to fetch recent dashboard transactions from a backend API. It includes a state class to hold transaction data, loading status, and errors, and exports a provider that performs an HTTP GET request, handling JSON decoding and error cases.

classes.name: DashboardRecentState
classes.description: Holds the result of fetching recent dashboard transactions, including transaction list, loading state, and error message.

methods.name: DashboardRecentState.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the current state with optional new values for transactions, loading status, and error.

methods.name: DashboardRecentState.initial
methods.description: Provides an initial state with no transactions, not loading, and no error.
